Hello,

Mr. Han's wife past away 2 days ago on a age of 71.
So, Mr. Han is still alive.

I know Mr. Han very well.
I it is a realy pitty for him that his wife past away just a few weeks 
before  there 50 years of marriage.
Also on the 10 Oktober we planned to intoduce the a book from the Dutch 
Token.
More then 70% of the blades are from Mr. Han Bing Siong and all his 
discription and articles.

Selamat Jalan,,,, Mrs Han.

John Klein Nagelvoort
The Netherlands




>From: "alchemyst" <alchemyst@...>
>Reply-To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
>To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [nihontostudy] Han Bing Siong passed away
>Date: Wed, 24 Sep 2003 12:00:44 -0000
>
>Forward from Rich T's message board:
>
>I have just received an email from a Oranda Token Kai member telling
>me on the passing yesterday of Han Bing
>       Siong. He was well known for his pentrating erudite scholarly
>works that reguarly appeared in the English and
>       Japanese language sword journals like Token Bijutsu, JSS/US and
>Token Society of Great Britain.
>
>       I shall never forget how he answered every query I had however
>insignificant and always had time for the younger
>       element. He once wrote, 'I don't feel its a waste of time to
>answer any thing you ahve to write Yahya for you are next
>       generation that must carry on what he started after the war.'
>
>       RIP good friend
>
>       We'll miss you.
>
>       Yahya Abdelsamad
>
